name: NPC Downtime Adventures
description:
Merry Christmas to my lovely players! Here's that Twine game I've been working on. Four mini-adventures, coming to a total of around 18k words.  Hope you like it :)

PS. I only caught it now, but if you're clicking on the link to the playlists, you're going to have to right-click and open the link in a new tab, because the way itch.io does links isnt compatible with my html code. I'll work on fixing that xox
